mention.text: member of the executive committee of the cc of the colombian communist party and editor in chief of the voz newspaper
31 mar 89 -- mr manuel cepeda , member of the executive committee of the cc of the colombian communist party and editor in chief of the voz newspaper
mr manuel cepeda , member of the executive committee of the cc of the colombian communist party and editor in chief of the voz newspaper
the colombian communist party and editor in chief of the voz newspaper
